name: Lead Cloud Engineer - Python
description:
* The vacancy involves relocation and work from Barcelona. The team is international, so a conversational level of English is required.

Our client, the European company which invests their time, money and talents in the fast-growing industry, supercharged by lockdown conditions in the global pandemic - FoodTech. They are developing the world’s first end-to-end ecosystem of virtual restaurants powered by autonomous robot-run kitchens to cope with current and potential challenges from the food market.

By now, they have several own working dark-kitchens which use software-defined and adaptive robots, computer vision, artificial intelligence and mechatronics that can ensure constant quality, adaptability to any recipe, and operational effectiveness across an endless variety of food production scenarios. They sell their food in multiple delivery platform and

are setting into production their own ordering app (a state of the art digital platform and parent brand to their portfolio of virtual restaurant brands).

So to make the next step in this technological revolution, they need an experienced Lead Cloud Engineer.

THE ROLE

As a Lead Engineer, you will be creating and leading the technical design and development of software solutions that support interfaces for interactions between their robotics OS and its different users: clients, culinary team, product managers, partners, suppliers etc.

THE EXPECTED RESULT

The software and hardware you will be working on should help to get better control over menu management, order management, inventory management, procurement, and most importantly customers' feedback.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Proposing and designing software solutions to address complex business needs,

  • Preparing technical and procedural documentation,

  • Working with stakeholders on defining the overall vision,

  • Taking responsibilities for features development and aligning with all your stakeholders,

  • Providing technical guidance and support to colleagues,

  • Code reviewing and QA testing.

WHAT WILL MAKE YOU A GREAT CANDIDATE

  • You have a degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience,

  • You have at least 5 years of experience in software development as well as at least 2 years as e.g. a Tech Lead or Principal Engineer,

  • You are an expert in object-oriented design and development experience (Python),

  • You already have management or mentoring experience with an agile leadership style,

  • You have experience in complex micro-services environments,

  • You have experience with cloud platforms: AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure,

  • You are familiar with databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB,

  • You have experience with server-less and GraphQL will be an advantage,

  • You have the ability to work well in a fast-moving, product-focused development team,

  • You want to create a product that can help greatly reduce food waste.

WHY YOU SHOULD CHOOSE THEM:

  • The chance to work on the next big thing in FoodTech

  • The opportunity to impact the development of the product: the architecture, the roadmap - to make everything all right from almost the beginning

  • Amazing colleagues and a great culture

  • Personal growth, innovation and learning every day

  • Relocation assistance

  • The beaches, food, vibes, mountains and architecture of Barcelona

  • Health insurance for you and your family

  • 23-25 paid vacation days (+9 public holidays)

  • Return flights home

  • Gym subscription
